post.desc:
You know... ğŸ˜• I think that hair tube is kinda essential to Sanae? I dunno. Like, it's definitely one of the things I use to identify her. And thematically, I see it as the slug that represents herself in the Slug-Frog-Snake trio. Though I suppose one can also argue that she doesn't need it anyway since she herself is already here. ğŸ¤”

Oh, and do note that everybody else is still drawing her wearing it lmao.

Sanae's portraits are, from left-to-right, from [**Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:Th15Sanae.png), [**Unconnected Marketeers**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:Th18Sanae.png), and [**Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:Th19Sanae.png).

On the snake part, the original says it goes counterclockwise... but there's no way it's going counterclockwise here?

I guess... it does if we start from the head to the tail, but that feels reallyyy counterintuitive. Or is it normal to describe a coil from bottom-to-top?

>ğŸ¤¨ Am I drunk?
